name: King Randoma starring in... DICE WARS
name_original: King Randoma starring in... DICE WARS
description:
Use your dice to make it to the end of the dungeon! Defeat the evil dice by attacking them with your own dice! After each encounter you'll be able to upgrade your available dice. Sometimes you'll be able to receive another die!

Choose your dice wisely and good luck!

How to play:

Click on an enemy to attack, you can choose from the enemies in sight.

All the available dice will be rolled for you once you choose the enemy, it can either damage the enemy or heal yourself.

After every "wave" of enemies you can upgrade 1 side of 1 of your dice.
